title: Not a big gambler
text: I'm not a big gambler and would only have an occasional punt on the Premiership. Usually gamble on this as plenty of markets and odds seem good compared to some. Wouldn't mind a football only app as loads on it but I only use football. That said it's easy to find Premiership games and they've added a Bet Builder function so you can add loads of goalscorers, bookings etc etc. in same game.

title: Boylesports App
text: This app is excellent. Very easy to navigate through each sports individual to place a bet. Depositing and withdrawing money is very straight forward. With the new cash out offer available during pending accumulators, this has brought the app ahead of its competitors and ahead of the game. #TimeToPlay

title: Good So Far
text: Despite a lot of complaints this app is running fine so far. Won ¬£15 quid tonight and have withdrew the money. If the money enters my bank account i will be more than happy to deposit again. App runs smoothly and is up to date. So far so good!

title: Read before you bet
text: All teams winning by 1/2 goals, from the beginning of the bet starting cash out was suspended, every single game from kick off says suspended all the way through until the games finishing. Ended up losing to a 90+ min goal but checked cash out at 60 mins. Awful betting site. Check your bet as soon as it kicks off they say ‚Äúmarket suspended for this match‚Äù but click on the match and it‚Äôs open for betting. Absolute scam!

title: Such an improvement
text: BoyleSports must have really listened to customer feedback. This version of the app is so easy to use and love the new bet builder and combined odds features. I can even check my loyalty points from my shop bets.

title: Restricted Account and terrible App
text: The app itself has always been terrible but they did tend to offer some decent promotions so stuck with them and was a whopping ¬£30 in credit over a 3 month period which was enough for them to restrict my account and ban me from promotions. Customer service is appalling and cannot tell you why but can tell you the decision will not be reversed. No great loss (which is exactly why my accounts been restricted)...

title: Like it. A lot!
text: I really like the new App Boylesports. A big move forward on the old one and certainly much easier to use. The navigation around the sports is much better! Big step forward. Best of luck.

title: Fast and reliable
text: The app is superfast and very reliable when it comes to placing on bets. I enjoyed the layout of it as well and how straight forward it is to be used. In the top range from all sportsbook apps out there.

title: App is fast

title: Disgraceful
